acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item was purchased on March 6, 1990.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter to Melville Whigs, Ella Wheeler Wilcox, Meriden, Connecticut, gives him permission to use one of her little poems and offers to write a poem to order for $15. She also sends the name of her photographer to contact for a particular picture of her.
